uploadAllFiles

() Object | Boolean

Defined in packages/ember-droplet/ember-droplet-mixin.js:148

Uploads all of the files that haven't been uploaded yet, but are valid files.

Returns:

Object | Boolean:

jQuery promise, or false if there are no files to upload.
